comments.text:
central-as-beta simulation: https://treeherder.mozilla.org/#/jobs?repo=try&revision=8859643fd6c00ddb1d0701298db10ca3f40c4624&filter-resultStatus=testfailed&filter-resultStatus=busted&filter-resultStatus=exception&filter-resultStatus=retry&filter-resultStatus=runnable&selectedJob=176595415

This blocks our daily central-to-beta merges.

Regression from bug 1447235.
comments.author: aryx.bugmail@gmx-topmail.de

comments.text: Bug 1447235 was backed out and re-landed with a fix in the test today. The failures from Comment 0 seems to be the one that were fixed. Am I wrong ?
comments.author: nchevobbe@mozilla.com

comments.text: It's because the feature is behind an ifdef NIGHTLY_BUILD, but the test assumes the menu item is always present (= also on release or beta).
comments.author: aryx.bugmail@gmx-topmail.de
